import React, { Component } from 'react' import { get, post } from 'axios' import { CONSTANTS } from '../../util/Constants' import { trackPromise, usePromiseTracker } from 'react-promise-tracker'; import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; import Loader from 'react-promise-loader'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Module from './Quiz' import Add from './Syllabus/Add'; const url_syllabus = CONSTANTS.SYLLABUS; const url_question = CONSTANTS.QUESTION; export default class DashBoard extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { syllabusCount: '', quizCount: '' } props.setHeader("Dashboard"); } async componentDidMount() { // console.log(this.props.userId) const syllabusUrl = url_syllabus.LIST_URL + '?page=1&size=20&sort=subject_id&order=desc&type=Subject&keyword'; this.props.ajaxUtil.sendRequest(syllabusUrl, {}, syllabusList => { this.setState({ syllabusPagination: syllabusList }) if (syllabusList.hasOwnProperty('data')) { if (syllabusList.data != null && syllabusList.data.length > 0) { this.setState({ syllabusList: syllabusList.data }); } } }, this.props.loadingFunction, { method: 'GET', isShowSuccess: false }); } render() { if (this.props.userId === "2001") { return ( <>
